munit:config.name: create-appointment-test-suite.xml
munit:config.doc:description:
As part of this test suite I would like to test below scenarios
1. Given valid payload, Verify appointment is creted or not. 2. Verify schedule date in request date is futute or not. 3. Given valid payload and appoinment created, Verify the insertResult variable contains generated key. 4. Given valid payload and appoinment created, Verify the response to user contains generated key ++ payload or not. 5. Verify the responses when an invalid payload is sent. 6. Verify the response when schedule date is past. 7. Verify when empty request payload is sent. 8. Verify when no patient id is sent in request. 9. Verify when no facility is sent in request.
